name: Meme World
description:
After MILLIONS of years of coding, I finally coded this game called "Meme World"

Only 5 levels (But a lot of code)

The ALL LEVELS is possible to beat

(P.S. Not mobile friendly)

---

How long to code: 1 Week

Idea: After I took a shower

Assets: 105

Lag/Glitch: Nope (I tested 20 times) [UNLESS YOUR COMPUTER IS RUSTY]

Fun: 7/10

---

Platformer Code thanks to: @jromagnoli

Sounds thanks to: Scratch Sound Library + Undertale + Rick Astley

Drawings thanks to: @Deadly-Eyes
